page.title: 10Government,Scremerston.
page.content: Scremerston comes under the{Ancroft {Parish Council}and{Berwick-upon-Tweed {Borough Council.}Ancroft P.C. meet whenever there is anything important to discuss but not less than five times each year. The Borough Council and its Committees meet regularly throughout the year. The full Council has 28 members including a{Mayor}who is elected at the{Annual Meeting}in May each year.Each elected member serves for four years. {Northumberland County Council}is responsible for the main highways,education,libraries,planning etc.The Borough Council is responsible for local planning,some highways,housing,local amenities,health and refuse collection.
